Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: Would never choose somewhere like this, but luckily I read some reviews first and they were right - the staff are incredibly friendly and the steak was tender and perfectly cooked. Sides were also very welcome. They also own the Italian restaurant next door so we were able to have tiramisu for dessert, which was epic

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: Nice food - burger and steak super juicy! Dessert very nice! Wine also good! Friendly staff, they even gave a birthday candle and birthday song! The restaurant was a nice a surprise! Recommend! Bathroom could be cleaner!

Review Text: I don't like writing bad reviews and I tend not to write but we ate there and the food wasn't very good (not horrible) definitely not worth the money. We ended up paying 5.5‚Ç¨ for what I'm sure was tap water and not a closed bottle of water ‚Ä¶

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: We found this restaurant by accident but what a good find. We were here early evening 5.30 so it wasn't busy but we passed by on other nights and it was full. Waiter was really pleasant and we ordered vegan burgers with chips which were superb. It is only a small restaurant so would advise to book to avoid disappointment.

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: The star is for the light taste of the truffle mayo in the hamburger. Nothing special for 16 euros. If you can walk a bit more, choose something more friendly and nicer. Very ‚Äúmeh‚Äù service and you have to pay for tab water (even if you have buy a bottle before).

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text:

There were no apologies or explanations of the waiter!

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: Place is very nice. Quality of meat is good but some choices are really weird. I took a New York steak and dish was full of koriander, that is strong and people might not like it, in particular because it heavily covers the taste of meat. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: We are waiting food for over an hour. I understand that it's Money20/20 event and a huge amount of people, but come on! If you don't have enough man power, then don't serve food on these events or cut the menu to burgers only or anything ‚Ä¶

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: Poor value, poor ingredients but even worse, zero pride in service or quality. Our party of four received contaminated toast, burned eggs and omelette, steak that tasted of liver and were charged for mayo. Would not recommend nor return. Disappointing.

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: Excellent service and food. Highly recommend

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: The burgers are even more basic than the most basic burger you could eat in your life, extremely low quality and high price for a basic burger, do not go here and save your money. Even the coffee we ordered was bad.

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: Very disappointing. The ¬´¬†French onion soup¬†¬ª is basically a small bowl of bouillon with some shredded cheese at the bottom of the bowl. No bread no cheese on top. Served on a bare old wooden plank... that‚Äôs what you get for ‚Ç¨7.50.  No value for you money. To be avoided.

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: High prices for small portions! If you order a soup it‚Äôs basically a mug of instant soup for ‚Ç¨7.50. Waiter was a cheeky wee guy with jokes that bordered on rude. I would never never visit this place again.

Name: The Big Apple
Review Text: 5 stars is a bit much perhaps but this is so much better than other places that I‚Äôve rated with 4 stars. Staff is great, atmosphere is great and the food is really good. From the main course to desert all very well done.
